Every time I start/re-start my Steam it's validating KSP and re-download's last patch

Edited October 10, 2014 by Lumaan

Every time I start/re-start my Steam it's validating KSP and re-download's last patch

This is not an issue with KSP it is an issue with Steam. Your best bet would be to remove the local files of KSP from steam then redownload. If you need support further than that, contact Steam support or make your way to the steam support forums. These support forums are regarding support to KSP. Your issue is directly related to Steam, as KSP does not control how steam verifies and validates games and how steam download's the KSP updates and patches.

Cheers,

ToTheMun
Solved it by deleting "appmanifest_220200.acf" under "Steam\steamapps" and then let Steam remake a new one.
